member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <Languages> <Language From="SQL" To="C#"> <Type From="bigint" To="long" IsCLRNullable="True" /> <Type From="binary" To="object" /> <Type From="bit" To="bool" IsCLRNullable="True" /> <Type From="char" To="string" /> <Type From="datetime" To="DateTime" IsCLRNullable="True" /> <Type From="decimal" To="decimal" IsCLRNullable="True" /> <Type From="float" To="double" IsCLRNullable="True" /> <Type From="image" To="byte[]" /> <Type From="int" To=" [rest of string was truncated]";.
